metadata.title: 2002 (May - Jul.) U.S. 2002 Crab and Groundfish Survey Data of the Eastern Bering Sea (Cruise ID: A/A2002-01)
metadata.description: To continue the annual series of assessment surveys of crab and groundfish of the eastern Bering Sea that began in 1971.
metadata.notes:
